name: Packapalooza: The Lost Samurai
description:
Stranded in the desert, the lost samurai must search the Oasis for resources to build a plane and escape. Collect enough wood, stone, and fur to build a plane to escape. Watch your health, thirst, and hunger while collecting resources. 

Controls

  • WASD to move
  • Q and E to rotate camera
  • Mouse to look, interact, and attack
  • Scroll mouse wheel to change weapons
  • Tab to open inventory
  • Click Food and Water icons to consume them
